column5: Well I treated myself to an early Christmas present this year.  My new toy for the winter (if the snow ever comes   ),  Specifically for ice fishing on Simcoe and hauling the hut out.  It's a 1996 Skidoo Grand Touring SE (670 CC). She's got electric start, reverse, thumb and handwarmers, full guages and only 4800 km's.  Now I just have to learn to use it.  ...but I will  Here she is.....
Nice looking machine! It looks brand new. That should do the job very nicely...and you (and the boys) just might have some fun as well! Congrats!!
Add a couple of pontoons and you'll be ready for Simcoe.Let it snow!Let it snow.freeze please
let me know when you go on the maiden voyage i have 120 new titanium picks in my track that i am dying to try out
nice machine im sure you will enjoy her...i cant wait to get out this saturday
I know two kids that are praying HARD HARD HARD for Snow.  LOL  Have fun I would have gone crazy if my Dad brought one of those home when I was that age.
Congrats Jim!  Enjoy    Whopper
Sweet looking machine Jim. Congratulations to you and the boys.
Awh  man - Are you guys ever gonna have some fun! Nice Machine!   670cc's - gonna fly!   Congrats  Don
Okay..so I bought a snow blower last winter and now Misty bought a sled...guaranteed no snow for at least two more years. Nice looking ride, buddy. Hope you get to use it!
Very nice Jim and good to see you finally got it.  Now you just have to hope for snow, and then you'll have to hope the boys let you drive it once in awhile
For a '96, that is a very nice looking machine.  Hope you don't have to sit around too long before you can use her.
Nice looking sled.  Hopefully we will get some snow as a Christmas present too so you and the boys can get out and test it out.
What is that thing??? I asked Glen and he did not know either. O well what ever it is is it a good lookin one and its shiney good luck on your  nice ......thinngy  Art
And not a snowflake in site!  Nice lookin' machine, bet ya can't wait for snow. Sooner or later it has to fall though. I wish you many happy rides on it.  Santa came early to your house
Congrats !!! Nice sled
Nice sled...looks mint ! you need snow !! and we both need ice so we can start using our new toys on the ice !

Sure looks good, I'm sure you'll get to use it sometime this year...  me, I don't think I'll ever get on one again, last one I was on the guy flipped it....nope, not for me....but enjoy and be safe.  Maureen
Nice Ride Bud! Congrats!
nice machine,that will sure get you out to the fishin grounds on simcoe or any other lake for that matter
Well. that is one nice ride, I'm sure you will get years of use out of it. By the looks of things, it's got a hitch on it too. Now you need to get one of these to haul behind it.
